UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Postsecretory processing generates multiple cathelicidins for enhanced topical antimicrobial defense.
Literature.Author: Murakami M, López-García B, Braff M, Dorschner RA, Gallo RL

Literature.Title: The human antimicrobial peptide LL-37 and its fragments possess both antimicrobial and antibiofilm activities against multidrug-resistant Acinetobacter baumannii.
Literature.Author: Feng X, Sambanthamoorthy K, Palys T, Paranavitana C

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus mprF(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=16µM),Escherichia coli O29(MIC=8µM),Streptococcus pyogenes NZ131(MIC=4µM),Candida albicans ATCC 14053(MIC=2µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=16µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=8-16µg/ml)
